product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Battery, Micro USB Charger, Quick Start Guide
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty for Device and 6 Months Manufacturer Warranty for In-box Accessories Including Batteries from the Date of Purchase
product_specification.Warranty Service Type: Customer can Call at 1800 1028 169 for Customer Support for Further Information and For Damage/Repair Services Customer can Visit to Nearest Services Centre

product_description.A 4G Phone: With the support of 4G, you can ensure that you get to enjoy clear call quality, social media, and multiplayer gaming with this phone.
product_description.Premium Design: Featuring a curved back, a high-performance keymat, and a premium finish, this phone’s design will catch your eye.
product_description.Long-lasting Battery: Featuring an 1150 mAh battery, this phone will be up and running for a long time.
product_description.Lots to Do: This phone lets you do much more than just having clear conversations! You can try the built-in camera, listen to the radio, or beat your own game scores.

review:
As a feature phone the product is fantastic. Light weight, good battery back up (though it is too early to comment).
But the problem I felt is that the font size of the display is very small as I have bought this phone for my elderly mother and she is unable to read the contact details at times. When calling someone the display shows phone numbers only. Contact name is shown in very small font size at the bottom of the small display which is pretty inconvenient for elderly person like my mother. You can't customize the font size nor the Black colour background.
Though this will not be an issue for young or middle aged users. Hope Nokia will definitely bring some changes in the software to make it more user friendly for elderly people as in our country aged people prefer these phones.
Overall good product.
It is a good product and i had gifted to my father and he is so happy now thank you for the product
Very nice phone performanse is very good, price high but no good option available in this segment so its ok, who use jio sim and want to use qwert phone for those its very good option,

Phone good we can use as secondary 4G phone, Light weight, but camera and UI is not better than Nokia 3310 (2017)
Nokia 3310 (2017) is so far better in camera, weight and UI system... Even this also looks good in hands.
BSNL 4G VOLTE is rocking... but price needs to come down, software update needed for easy contacts sync... over all it's a good basic phone 👌

I wanted to buy a basic phone. This phone is good.
But you have to purchase apps with extra money.

A good mobile with old memories. This is for people who are addicted to news, internet, what's app, Facebook etc. After using this mobile i spend very less time on social apps. It's difficult for few days to survive without a smart phone. But definitely in some time you will understand that you have wasted a lots of time on useless apps rather than a good family time. This mobile has all basic features. It's font is very small and hence not friendly for elders.

The only pro of this mobile phone is it launched in 2020.

Cons:

1. No 4G reception, everytime we try to call it says it's Switched off, have to switch off and switch on again to regain network.

2. Outdated and irritating software, the lock key is frustrating , everytime u press the disconnect button the phone gets locked.

3. Poor battery life

4. Interface Is outdated and lacks in basic features and options.

5. Overpriced as per current market standards.

These cons can be solved by a software update if Nokia can roll out a patch.
Mobile is over good. Caller ID display size needs to be improved. Very Small Name display.

If you are planning to buy this model Nokia 225 4G for your elder parents, please don't buy.

Con's are:

(i) The font size is too low, even I was not able to view (I'm just 29 yrs old) the contact's name and other text messages. Most of the major phone settings options are missing in this model.
(ii) Sound clarity is too low. not much audible.
(iii) if you are planning to buy this for your elder ones or business purpose. please don't buy this phone.
(iv) hope you all know for electronics purchase in the e-commerce platform we can't return this product for exchange or refund. We have the replacement option if the phone is damaged.

I was looking for non-android 4g phone. Like traditional button phones. I purchased this immediately when i saw this phone.
Exchanged another button phone for this and I got 650 discount.

Phone is very fast (Those who owns Jio phone would completely love this phone).

Traditional Button Phone, with usual feature phone software. But still the shortcuts change for joystick not done.

Pressing End button locks the screen instead of going back but it has separate back button, it will take time to get used this phone.

Cons:

Build quality of buttons, worst. 1000Rs lava phones have very good build quality, button placement.
Nokia has taken the old nokia phones design and forget about their quality.

Bluetooth has some bugs while connecting with bluetooth headsets.

Conclusion:

I wont use facebook, whatsapp etc. I would use this only phone calling. This satisfies me.

But it is worth for 2000, not worth for 3500.
The phone is best. But the software needs update like to customize font size, keep unlock the keypad & few more like old Nokia settings.

Now I am using Nokia 225 4G. NO HANG, NO KEYPAD problem. Nice voice quality. Smooth performance just like previously Nokia phone.

Thank you NOKIA.

DO NOT BUY. Very small font that cannot be adjusted. Note that this phone does not have even basic functionality like adjustable font size or setting profiles for ringer volume control etc. DO NOT BUY.

Read this before buying.

This is not your typical Nokia feature phone. If you are buying this for your elderly, who is already using other Nokia feature phone, please keep in mind that it's different. Settings are different. End call button if pressed when the phone is idle will lock the screen. Contact names and other text are small. I couldn't find any setting to make it larger. It's really difficult to copy contacts from old Nokia feature phone. I couldn't find an option to keep the phone in silent mode in one press. You have to go to settings and reduce the volume to zero for silent mode. It's really frustrating. If someone finds and easier way to do this, please comment. Please think twice before buying. Only advantage from other Nokia feature phone is you get Jio 4G.
Thanks

NOT EXPECTED AS 4G PHONE, ZERO CUSTOMIZATION TRAP OF 4G BY NOKIA

The device is just below average. Go for it only as spare or backup device as it supports 4G SIM (Dual 4G with VoLte) rest nothing is great other than the Call Quality and battery backup.

> Display is poor and the fonts are tiny.
> Device Speaker Volume is not good.
> Camera is just useless in Indoors but below average in Outdoors with good light.
> Wireless FM is not good either as the device struggles to Auto tune the Stations.
> No WiFi and Hotspot functionality.
> No protective film on the display and hence the device gets scratched easily; within few days of usage it will look like an old phone losing the display visibility.
> Call Recording feature is available but one needs to initiate while on call from the Menu and the other party will hear a brief BEEP when the Recording Starts or Ends.
> Build quality of the product is poor.

I would recommend to go for Nokia 215 4G that does not have a Camera instead of this one and save few rupees.

As we do not see any other manufacturers who sell an Unlocked 4G feature phone nowadays, Nokia 4G is the only option left for us.
